subject: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
  FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA
Plot 33,  Abubakar Tafawa Balewa  Way
Central Business District ,
Cadastral Zone,
P.M..B. 187,Garki Abuja.
Nigeria
Attention;  Sir/Madam  ,
The management of central bank of Nigeria, the apex bank of the country, bankers bank, wants to bring to your notice that after our board meeting we have instructions to pay urgent attention to your funds transfer from federation account  to ensure that you receive your funds within the next 48hrs to avoid you not to be deceived any longer by fake and sacked people claiming what they are not, for you to receive your funds in good fate, in order to avoid you to complain bitterly and that is the reason why i am out to handle it by my self as the acting Governor of the bank.
You are advised to proof to us that you are the rightful beneficiary of the funds by providing to us the following:
 
1)     Your full name and private address.
 
2)     Your telephone and Whatsapp number for easy communication.
 
3)     A copy of your personal identification.
4)     Amount expecting.
 
The above information is needed from you for official use and to avoid any mistake in the course of making the transfer.
However, you are to inform us which of the below stated methods you wish to receive your fund:
Thus:
A.    By Online Bank Transfer
B.    By Check or an ATM Card
C.    By Bank to Bank Wire Transfer
 
Note: You are advised to desist from communicating with any person or group of persons from Nigeria or overseas as regards to your funds transfer to avoid damaging the good image of our bank and the country.  We are the only bank that will conclude your transfer successfully into your designated bank account which you are going to provide to us, without any hindrance.
 
As soon as we hear from you, we will commence the processing of your funds transfer. Have it in mind that we are bankers and we rely on telephone conversation kindly send us your whatsapp telephone number for easy communication as soon as you receive this very mail
We look forward to hear from you immediately you get this very mail and the attached is my working ID card and international passport for your own view, for you to know who you are working with.
Once again, i will advice you to keep this transaction secret and confidential, until the next 48hrs when your funds are in your possession .
 Thanks And Remain Blessed.
DR. OLAYEMI MICHAEL CARDOSO
BANKER BANK CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA OFFICE OF THE 
EXECUTIVE GOVERNOR (CBN)
DIRECT HOTLINE:+234 815-433-6298

subject: Re:  CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this funds transfer, as I wasn't expecting anything of the sort. Could you please provide more details about it? How did my name come up in your board meeting and why was it decided that these funds should be transferred to me?

I'm also curious about the different methods of receiving the fund you mentioned - online bank transfer, check or an ATM card, and bank to bank wire transfer. Could you explain how each of these methods work?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Ida

subject: DIRECTOR, FOREIGN/REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT WORLD BANK AUDITORS/GOVERNOR (CBN)
body:
*CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA*
*  FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA*

*Plot 33,  **Abubakar Tafawa Balewa  Way*
*Central Business District ,*
*Cadastral Zone,*
*P.M..B. 187,Garki Abuja.*

*Nigeria*


*Attention: IDA,*


* Dear , Sir*















*We the management of Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN)  bankers bank have
received your mail and content well noted.However, we understand from your
mail that you did not state any mode you intend to get your fund by and it
is very important that you make that choice to enable us proceed in this
transaction and get your fund to you and also indicate to us the amount you
are expecting to avoid any mistake in the process of transferrring or
releasing the funds to the wrong person so you must surely indicate amount
expecting and mode of receiving funds first of all before we can proceed
and make sure we are dealing with the right person as our procedures
because we have it in our system already which we must surely confirm from
you first of all.MODE OF RECEIVING FUNDS1. BANK TO BANK WIRE TRANSFER   2.
ONLINE BUSINESS ACCOUNT   3. INTER SWITCH ATM CARD4. CASHIER CHECKFinally,
we are bankers. It is our duty to serve you better and give you the best of
our services in order for us to make sure we discharge our duty perfectly
and hands up our hands before the limited time given to us, to conclude
this.*

*Thanks for your cooperation and we look forward to hearing from you as
soon as possible  to enable us to proceed.*





*Thanks And Remain Blessed.*

*DR. OLAYEMI MICHAEL CARDOSOBANKER BANK CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA OFFICE OF
THE *

*EXECUTIVE GOVERNOR (CBN)DIRECT HOTLINE:+234 815-433-6298*

subject: Re: DIRECTOR, FOREIGN/REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT WORLD BANK AUDITORS/GOVERNOR (CBN)
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Michael,

Thank you for your detailed message. I'm quite intrigued by the process you've outlined, although I must admit, it's a bit complex for me to fully grasp.

Could you please clarify what you mean by "mode of receiving funds"? Are there different methods available? If so, could you explain each one in simple terms?

Also, regarding the amount I'm expecting, I'm not entirely sure. Could there be a mix-up or misunderstanding? 

I appreciate your patience and look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ida

subject: DIRECTOR, FOREIGN/REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT WORLD BANK AUDITORS/GOVERNOR (CBN)
body:
*CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA*
*  FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA*

*Plot 33,  **Abubakar Tafawa Balewa  Way*
*Central Business District ,*
*Cadastral Zone,*
*P.M..B. 187,Garki Abuja.*

*Nigeria*


*Attention: IDA,*


* Dear , Sir*



*We the management of Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN)  bankers bank have
received your mail and content well noted. **We the management of Central
Bank of Nigeria (CBN) write to confirmed your email message of today and we
have also received an instruction from the President Office, directing us
to pay urgent attention to your outstanding payment sum of Ten Million Five
hundred Thousand USD ($10.5m) for irrevocable and final payment of above
fund.*

*It's left for you to choose with the below method on how you want to
receive your payment in full. Also kindly send us your personal details
such as, full name, address, telephone number for easy communication and a
copy of valid ID for official use.*











* MODE OF RECEIVING FUNDS 1. BANK TO BANK WIRE TRANSFER     2. ONLINE
BUSINESS ACCOUNT     3. INTER SWITCH ATM CARD 4. CASHIER CHECK Finally, we
are bankers. It is our duty to serve you better and give you the best of
our services in order for us to make sure we discharge our duty perfectly
and hands up our hands before the limited time given to us, to conclude
this.*

*Thanks for your cooperation and we look forward to hearing from you as
soon as possible  to enable us to proceed.*



 *Thanks And Remain Blessed.*

*DR. OLAYEMI MICHAEL CARDOSOBANKER BANK CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA OFFICE OF
THE *

*EXECUTIVE GOVERNOR (CBN)DIRECT HOTLINE:+234 815-433-6298*

subject: Re: DIRECTOR, FOREIGN/REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT WORLD BANK AUDITORS/GOVERNOR (CBN)
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Michael,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite exciting to hear about this sum of money, it's a lot more than I'm used to dealing with!

I'm curious about the different methods of receiving funds that you mentioned. Could you please explain a bit more about each one? For example, how does the bank to bank wire transfer work? And what is an Inter Switch ATM card?

Also, could you tell me more about why I've been selected for this payment? It seems like such a large amount and I'm not sure why it would be coming my way.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ida
